description:
Charged with treason, Rumaty was deported from his country. In order to find out the truth about this incident, Kajika heads to Raginei with Eugene and Toranosuke. Meanwhile, Lee-Leng is troubled by Quinza`s lack of action regarding the conspiracy. At the same time, Lee-Leng is worried about Kajika now that Raginei has become very unstable. In the midst of this turmoil, Carl, the young "lion" of the Rosenthals who`s in opposition with the Burnsworth group, visits Raginei palace.
Source: crunchyroll
